Mahindra and Mahindra (M&M) has a wide range of commercial vehicles in its portfolio, including light-duty trucks, heavy-duty trucks, 3-wheelers, and electric vehicles (EVs). The company's coverage is vast, with a strong presence in over 100 countries worldwide, including India, South Africa, and the United States. In India, M&M has a vast network of over 600 dealerships, providing customers with access to its products and services.

Sales numbers for M&M's commercial vehicles have been consistently strong, reflecting the company's commitment to quality and innovation. In the light-duty segment, M&M has a range of products, including the Bolero Pickup, Jeeto, and Supro. These vehicles have been popular in the Indian market due to their low maintenance cost, fuel efficiency, and versatility. In the financial year 2021, M&M's light commercial vehicles sales stood at over 98,000 units, accounting for a significant share of the market.

In the heavy-duty segment, M&M's range of products includes the Blazo, Furio, and Alfa. These vehicles have a payload capacity of over 15 tons and are designed for long-distance transportation. In the financial year 2021, M&M's heavy commercial vehicles sales stood at over 30,000 units, reflecting the company's focus on meeting the diverse needs of customers.

In the 3-wheeler segment, M&M's products include the Treo, Supro, and Alfa. These vehicles are designed for last-mile connectivity and are popular in urban areas due to their small size, low maintenance cost, and high fuel efficiency. In the financial year 2021, M&M's 3-wheeler sales stood at over 32,000 units, reflecting the company's commitment to providing cost-effective solutions to customers.

In the EV segment, M&M has been a pioneer in the Indian market, with a range of products, including the e-Verito, e-KUV, and e-Alfa. In the financial year 2021, M&M's EV sales stood at over 7,000 units, reflecting the company's focus on developing sustainable mobility solutions.

In conclusion, M&M's commercial vehicles have a wide range of products, vast coverage, and a strong dealer network. The sales numbers for each of these categories reflect the company's commitment to quality, innovation, and meeting the diverse needs of customers. With its focus on sustainability and innovation, M&M is well-positioned to lead the way in the Indian automobile industry.
